title: Against All Hope 1982 (Biography, Drama) Michael Madsen, Maureen McCarthy, Cecil Moe | Movie

sources.title: Against All Hope 1982 (Biography, Drama) Michael Madsen, Maureen McCarthy, Cecil Moe | Movie
sources.description:
From despair to deliverance...
Cecil (played by Madsen) is a desperate man;  in danger of losing his family, and driven to the edge of suicide by alcoholism.  But is rescued by a priest who reaches out to hear his story.

Original title: Against All Hope (1982) AKA: One for the Road

Director: Edward T. McDougal
Writers: Edward T. McDougal, Cecil Moe, Jean Moe, 
Stars: Michael Madsen, Maureen McCarthy, Cecil Moe
Genres: Biography, Drama


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:34 Struggles with alcoholism, family conflicts, and seeking help from a preacher in a 1982 drama film.
19:42 Family dynamics, struggles, and new beginnings unfold in a rural setting.
22:09 Struggles of a man named Cecil Moe unfold as he faces challenges in work, family, and health.
30:46 Family struggles with alcoholism, leading to ultimatums and tough decisions.
43:50 A man struggles with alcoholism, promises to quit, but faces temptation and relapse, causing family distress.
55:28 Family struggles with financial issues, marital problems, and alcoholism leading to a potential eviction.
1:02:07 A man's life spirals out of control due to financial struggles, addiction, and family issues.
1:12:26 A man finds redemption through faith after a life of struggle and addiction.
1:20:17 A man finds faith and sobriety, leading to a transformed life and hope for his family.


CCC sidenote: Michael Madsen's first film credit. Also it's no coincidence that the main character has the same name as the producer/writer/editor - and cast member.


@CultCinemaClassics
